#!/bin/sh

# variables
APPDIR="/Applications/"
TMPDIR=$(dirname "$(realpath $INSTALLER_PATH)")

# install pkg files
sudo installer -pkg "$TMPDIR/Install_Cisco-Jabber-Mac.pkg" -target /
refs.fe30bb39:
#!/bin/sh

# variables
LOGGED_IN_USER=$(scutil <<< "show State:/Users/ConsoleUser" | awk '/Name :/ { print $3 }')
# functions

trash() {
  local logged_in_user="$1"
  local target_file="$2"
  local timestamp="$(date +%Y-%m-%d-%s)"
  local rand="$(jot -r 1 0 99999)"

  # replace ~ with /Users/$logged_in_user
  if [[ "$target_file" == ~* ]]; then
    target_file="/Users/$logged_in_user${target_file:1}"
  fi

  local trash="/Users/$logged_in_user/.Trash"
  local file_name="$(basename "${target_file}")"

  if [[ -e "$target_file" ]]; then
    echo "removing $target_file."
    mv -f "$target_file" "$trash/${file_name}_${timestamp}_${rand}"
  else
    echo "$target_file doesn't exist."
  fi
}

sudo pkgutil --forget 'com.cisco.Jabber'
sudo pkgutil --forget 'com.cisco.pkg.jabberplugin'
sudo pkgutil --forget 'com.jabra.CiscoJabberPlugin'
sudo pkgutil --forget 'com.logitech.LogiUCPlugin'
sudo pkgutil --forget 'com.PlantronicsPlugin.CiscoJabberPlugin'
sudo pkgutil --forget 'com.sennheiser.CiscoJabberPlugin'
sudo pkgutil --forget 'com.Sennheiser.pkg.SennheiserSDKv789904MacSDKv8602'
sudo rm -rf '/Applications/Cisco Jabber.app'
sudo rm -rf '/Library/Application Support/Cisco/Unified Communications/Jabber/'
sudo rm -rf '/Library/Logs/Jabber/'
trash $LOGGED_IN_USER '~/Library/Application Support/Cisco/Unified Communications/Jabber'
trash $LOGGED_IN_USER '~/Library/Caches/com.cisco.Jabber'
trash $LOGGED_IN_USER '~/Library/Logs/Jabber'
trash $LOGGED_IN_USER '~/Library/Preferences/com.cisco.Jabber.plist'
trash $LOGGED_IN_USER '~/Library/WebKit/com.cisco.Jabber'
